newsitem.title: DENMARK: Danish shares seen rising modestly in thin trade.
newsitem.headline: Danish shares seen rising modestly in thin trade.

text.p: Danish share prices opened unchanged on Monday, with dealers predicting modest rises ahead in thin trade, echoing Friday's positive U.S. market.
"The past few weeks' U.S. data have been generally good and Friday's jobs figures were well received on Wall Street, so the outlook is positive here although trading could be thin," one dealer said.
The focus was expected to remain on top Danish banks Den Danske and Unidanmark, in which foreign investors have been showing interest, he said.
